name: Boss Baby - Help The Baby To Escape
name_original: Boss Baby - Help The Baby To Escape
description:
Boss Baby - Help The Baby To Escape is a FREE platform adventure game!

Entertaining gameplay, hours of fun guaranteed!

Find the key to unlock next level, avoid enemies and obstacles and find your way out!

Get through all 24 rooms to complete the game - but be careful - it is not as easy as it looks!

Help little boss Templeton baby to jump up and down with just an easy touch.

Get bonus points by collecting coins. Get ranked in leaderboard.

Boss Baby - Help The Baby To Escape is waiting for you - download now and share with friends!
